simulator.payloads.translators

Class BooleanCanPayloadTranslator

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.payloads.translators.CanPayloadTranslator
      • simulator.payloads.translators.BooleanCanPayloadTranslator

  • public class BooleanCanPayloadTranslator
extends CanPayloadTranslator
    Translates a single boolean value into a 4-byte payload.
